div.l: And he that bettir shuld knet þe reyn̄
Alas quod Aleyn̄ for Cristis peyn̄
"~" in left margin may be correction mark.Ley down thy swerd and I wol myn̄ adlsodlsoalso
I is ful white God woot as is a Roo
Be goddis banys he shlalslalshal nat skape vs bath
Why ne haddist þowe put þe capil in the lath
Il hayle Aleyn̄ be God þowe is a fon̄
These sely Clerkis have ful fast I ron
Toward the fen̄ both Aleyn̄ and eke Iohn
And when̄ the myller sawe that þey wer͗e goon̄
He half a busshel of flour͗e hath I take
And bad his wyfe go knede it in a Cake
He seyd I trowe the Clerkis wele were aferid
Ȝit can̄ a myller make a Clerkis berd
For al her art ȝit lete hem go her wey
Lo wher͗e they goo ȝee lete the Childryn̄ pley
They gete hem noght so lightly be my croun̄
These sely Clerkis rennyn̄ vp and down̄
With kepe kepe stond stond Iossa ware the rere
Ga wistil thowe and I shal kepe hym̄ here
But shortly tyl it was verry nyght
"~" in left margin may be correction mark.The coude nat thogh they did al her myght
He kapullis cache for þey ran̄ so fast
Til in a dich they caght hem atte last
Wery and weet as best is in þe reyn̄
Comyth sely Iohn and with hym̄ Aleyn̄
Alas quod Iohn the day þat I was born̄
Nowe are wee dryve to hething ⁊and to skorn̄
Our͗e corn̄ is stole men wol vs folis cal
Bath the wardeyn̄ and our͗e felawis al
And namly the myller so wela way
Thus pleynyth Iohn as he goith be þe way
Toward the Mil and ledith beyard in his hond
The myller sitting be the fieir͗e they fond
For it was nyght and ferther myght þey noght
